comment.author: 29418639@N06
comment._content: Dutch army, colonial troops, KNIL (Royal Dutch East-Indian Army). Inspection by minister (i.e., statesman, politician) Ch. J. I. M. Welter of the men of the Royal Reserves before their departure to the Dutch East-Indies at the baracks of the Royal Reserves in Nijmegen. Netherlands, 1939.

comment.author: 26022992@N07
comment._content: Minister walks along identity parade to try to see who let the air out of his bicycle wheels.
